name: The Chicken God
description:
A Story set in the Medieval Times, A man was Chosen to be the Gods of Chickens. On his journey to save the Princess from her Illness he meets a Lovely Panda Lady. Together they battle evil and save peoples lives. 

As you try to save the Princess you meet an evil guy who wants all the power he can get. Making an army and experiments on animals, which you have to defeat.
